com.tractrac.model.lib.impl.metadata

Class AbstractMetadataContainer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tractrac.model.lib.api.attachment.AbstractAttachable
      • com.tractrac.model.lib.impl.AbstractNamed
        • com.tractrac.model.lib.impl.metadata.AbstractMetadataContainer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IAttachable, IIdentifiable, INamed, IMetadataContainer, IPropertiesContainer, com.tractrac.util.lib.api.serialize.ISerializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Competitor, Control, ControlRoute, PathRoute, Race

    public abstract class AbstractMetadataContainer
extends AbstractNamed
implements IMetadataContainer
    Abstract class that can be implemented by all the classes that implement both the INamed and the IMetadataContainer interfaces.
    Author:
    Jorge Piera Llodrá

        Description copied from interface: IMetadataContainer

        • name: 4 + length
